com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal

Class InputEnabledAbstractTerminal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.AbstractTerminal
      • com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.InputEnabledAbstractTerminal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputProvider, Terminal
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StreamBasedTerminal

    public abstract class InputEnabledAbstractTerminal
extends AbstractTerminal
implements InputProvider
    This is an abstract terminal that can also read input events (keys), with a default implementation of the methods from InputProvider.
    Author:
    Martin

      void addInputProfile(KeyMappingProfile profile)
      Adds a KeyMappingProfile to be used when converting raw user input bytes to Key objects.
      Key readInput()
      Returns the next Key off the input queue or null if there is no more input events available
